p: The chemical characterization of P. dioscoridis EO was extracted via hydro-distillation afforded golden yellow (0.037%). The chemical profiles of the extracted EO were assigned depending upon the GC-MS analysis. The GC-MS chromatogram of the EO is presented in Figure 1 exhibiting the main peaks from all identified components. Twenty-nine compounds were identified from the EO of P. dioscoridis represented 96.91% of the total oil. All the identified compounds along with their chemical and physical properties were summarized in Table 1.
